author: perezhilton
title: Jennifer Lopez & Alex Rodriguez Are Dating! | PerezHilton.com
text:
Well, that was a change-up we didn't see coming.
According to Page Six , Jennifer Lopez and Alex Rodriguez are the hottest new couple we had no idea existed!
Video: NEVER Challenge J.Lo To A Dance-Off!
A source spills that the Latinolicious superstars have been together and somehow kept it secret from the world for a while now:
"They have been seeing each other for a few months, and were together in LA this past weekend."
A FEW MONTHS?? How did no one figure this out before now? Hmm…
OK. After a moment to process, we have to say we do like this pairing.
While J.Lo and Drake 's fling and A-Rod's recently ended relationship with genetics entrepreneur Anne Wojcicki were definitely inneresting, we didn't really get them as couples.
Related: Jen On Ex Marc Anthony: 'There's A Reason We're Not Together'
But these two? Perfection! The source confirms:
"They are really into each other because they have so much in common — from their Latin roots, to their love of New York, and their kids."
Right??
PLUS Jennifer dating fellow diva Madonna 's ex? Too juicy!
What do YOU think of J.Lo and A-Rod as a couple?
[ Image via Instagram . ]
Tags: alex rodriguez , drake , jennifer lopez , latinolicious , love line , madonna
